title: Vivaldi - Musica per Mandolin e liuto
description:
Vivaldi - Musica per Mandolino e Liutu

Mp3 256 kbit/s

Performer: Brian Feehan, Eduardo Eguez, Rolf Lislevand, Thomas C. Boysen, Thor Harald Johnsen, et al.



Antonio Vivaldi 1678-1741 Vivaldi, a brilliant composer for string instruments of all sorts, produced some real gems for the mandolin and the lute. These fine jewels, performed by the eclectic musician Rolf Lislevand, grace the Vivaldi Collection as number 26.
